relevant_findings.acne: Minimal acne on face, chest, and back
relevant_findings.hirsutism: Minimal hirsutism on abdomen and chest with shaved hair on lower abdomen and several dark periareolar hairs
relevant_findings.tanner_stage: Tanner V breast development and pubic hair distribution

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: JM has generally been happy with use of DMPA, indicates change in BMI from 26.2 to 27 kg/m² but no significant issues with acne or hirsutism.
